website_summaries.verdict: A matte foundation designed for oily and combination skin that is formulated to last all day.
pros: Contains ingredients designed to brighten skin
Formulated for full coverage, so a little goes a long way
Available in a number of different shades
Matte finish is designed to last up to 16 hours
cons: Some complain about this settling into pores and fine lines

customer_reviews.title: Fan of Nars luminous foundation.
customer_reviews.text: I started using Nars foundation a year ago but Sephora was the only store where I could find it and it was inconvenient so I went to Amazon to the rescue. I am very pleased with the product and the luminous look of my skin is a living testimony. It also provides excellent coverage of imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: need a better color chart
customer_reviews.text: need a better color chart. the colors are two far between range. There needs to be a color in-between each one
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Marie Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Not real... go to authorized retailer to buy
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely watered down and could not possibly be real. I bought the same bottle at Sephora a few months before this and when I got this in I’d spent so much I used it anyways since I couldn’t buy another bottle at the time. I ran out faster than I did before and had to use so much more than I had used with the one from Sephora. I just returned to Sephora to buy my third bottle and there is a marked difference. If you want to try this product go through Sephora not Amazon as it is not the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: seems sketchy
customer_reviews.text: This product is watery. I have a side by side sample from Sephora and this one is just like water compared to the one from the store. The color is also a little lighter. The cap was very easy to screw off like it had been tampered with....
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Baker

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Thina nd watered down. Much different color than sample I received from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat watery
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it was just this bottle, the settling, sitting in a warehouse, but this bottle was more watery than usual. My last bottle was the quality I expect from Sephora.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley s

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It last a long time. I have been using it for several years. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: My new go to! It’s like water, but it covers great! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is a total game changer. I absolutely LOVE it. The seller was great, too!
customer_reviews.author: sharon curley

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: I love this foundation, it is my all time favorite. However it unfortunately came watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Worth every red cent.
customer_reviews.text: I am 35 and have dry skin and am starting to get wrinkles around the eyes. This is the BEST foundation I have ever worn. I have tried cheap and expensive. I’ve tried light coverage, medium as well as full coverage. This is soft, moisturizing medium coverage. Exactly what I wanted. And the best part is that it doesn’t rub off on your hands or clothes the way some foundation does. I’m in love. It’s pricey but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Roya Popescu

customer_reviews.title: Too watery
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it was so watery. After reading the reviews that some said it was watery I still decided to purchase because I know NARS is watery compared to others. But this was excessive. Returned and bought in store.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

product_meta.title: NARS All Day Luminous Weightless Foundation, Santa Fe
product_meta.description: Full, natural-looking coverage with unexpectedly weightless, 16-hour wear. Highly pigmented and perfectly balanced, this breakthrough formula builds and blends effortlessly with just one drop.
